title: blender 3D basics
description:
this is the file which is uploaded by rugmufjoe but the file was broken into two rar files and many people were been unable to open this file. I opened this file and again uploaded this file so that any one who finds difficult will be helpful to them 

Book Details
Language : English
Paperback : 468 pages [ 235mm x 191mm ]
Release Date : June 2012
ISBN : 1849516901
ISBN 13 : 9781849516907
Author(s) : Gordon C. Fisher
Topics and Technologies : All Books, Blender, Beginner's Guides, Open Source, Web Graphics & Video


contents of the Book. 

introducing blender and animation 
getting comfortable using the 3D view
controlling the lamp, the camera, and animation objects
Modeling with vertices, Edges, and Faces
Building a simple boat 
Making and moving the oars
Planning your work, working your Plan 
Making the Sloop 
Finishing your sloop 
Modeling organic Forms, Sea, and Terrain 
Improving your Lighting and Camera Work 
Rendering and Composting 

Prop Quiz Answers
